translations: [解剖]三头肌（tricep 的复数形式）

sentences.sentence: But the exercise—and those toned, tight triceps?
sentences.translation: 但是锻炼又是怎么养成的呢，还有健美紧凑的三头肌？

sentences.sentence: And one of the best... our favorite exercise in the shower is for the triceps.
sentences.translation: 完全正确！最好的一种……我们在洗澡时最喜欢的运动是锻炼三头肌。
